name: Across The Seasons
description:
Across The Seasons is an rpg multiplayer game about exploring a huge fantasy world inspired by Greek and Norse mythology . You start your adventure with your friends at the central of the city of light in order to retrieve the shields of balance. The further you travel the more challenging it gets.

Developed by : 

  • Mourad Aouini
  • Mohamed Bedis Denden
  • Mortadha Ben Araar
  • Mohammed Iskander Jouini
